title: API Gateway to Lambda with observability
description: Create an API with metrics, alerts, traces, logs, and dashboard.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern deploys Amazon API Gateway HTTP API with a single route that is integrated with and AWS Lambda function written in Node.js. Pattern uses Amazon CloudWatch logs, metrics, alerts, dashboards, Embedded Metrics Format, AWS X-Ray, Amazon SNS.
